title: Farrer Park Hospital Crawler
description: Web crawler for extracting specialist doctor information from Farrer Park Hospital website. Crawls all pages with optional cookie support for authenticated scraping.

cookies.title: üç™ Cookies (Optional)
cookies.description: Optional array of cookies for authenticated scraping. Each cookie should be in browser extension format with fields: name, value, domain, path, secure, httpOnly, sameSite, expirationDate.

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: The domain for which the cookie is valid

path.title: Path
path.description: The path for which the cookie is valid

secure.title: Secure
secure.description: Whether the cookie should only be sent over HTTPS

httpOnly.title: HTTP Only
httpOnly.description: Whether the cookie should only be accessible via HTTP(S) and not JavaScript

sameSite.title: Same Site
sameSite.description: The SameSite attribute of the cookie

expirationDate.title: Expiration Date (Unix timestamp)
expirationDate.description: The expiration date of the cookie as Unix timestamp

headless.title: üñ•Ô∏è Headless Mode
headless.description: Run browser in headless mode. Set to false for debugging, true for production.

outputFilename.title: üìÅ Output Filename (Optional)
outputFilename.description: Custom filename for the output JSON file (without .json extension). If not provided, will use default naming.
